DOC.brief_summary: To determine the safety & immunogenicity of a potential vaccine against meningococcal B disease
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety, Immunogenicity and Tolerability of Meningococcal Group B Vaccine in Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy 1825 year olds Prior history of vaccination with any meningococcal vaccine Prior history of any invasive meningococcal disease
